title: Google erased everything from the phone, please help me get it back
content:
I lost my phone and I was trying to erase the data from my stolen device through my laptop with the help of google. But it erased everything, everything from other device which I logged into while i lost my phone. That is my friends' phone and I have no idea what to do to get the data back. he lost every image and contact he had so far. I am extremely guilty for what happened. Please help me to get his images and contacts back. He had no backups whatsoever. 
note- My phone and his phone was the same android company and model.
